intro: Oreosolen, commonly known as the "butterfly plant," is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, which includes many succulent species. Oreosolen thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, requiring minimal water and well-draining soil.
